title: India, Brazil, Argentina chart new economic vision for South-South collaboration
description: As the global order transitions into a multipolar framework, India’s economic engagement with Latin America, particularly Brazil and Argentina, is emerging as a cornerstone for advancing South-South cooperation. These relationships go beyond trade statistics and diplomatic overtures; they symbolise ...

title: Crypto is now worth more than the entire GDP of Canada, Brazil, and even the UK
description:
The crypto market has smashed through a historic milestone, topping $4 trillion in total market capitalization — a value now larger than the annual GDPs of the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Canada, Brazil, and Russia.

Bitcoin led the charge, hitting an all-time high of $123,205 earlier this week. ...
